Quick Glad Deck:-
After looking at some Glad guides I could see that people weren't putting much emphasis on Bestiari, just seeing it as a formality. So I thought take it out and go on the backrow hunt.
1). People aren't expecting backrow like Xing and Gyokkou with glads so they play around you drawing a Bestiari like a normal Glad deck.
2). I have 3 Laquari but the deck plays on fast  aggression with Econ and Dimacari, I found it worked best With 2 and 2 Electro. 
3). Also Laquari gets a boost from Gyokkou so runs well into the mirror match - the downside is you rarely get out Batman and Heraklinos..
Just wanted to try something different this season and this was super fun to play..
